name: Alpha Kilo Aviation, LLC
about: Alpha Kilo Aviation, LLC, located at the Ak-Chin Regional Airport, is a reputable flight school that has been rebranded and revitalized since 2022. Following the passing of its previous owner, the school has been transformed to continue providing top-notch flight training. With a team of five experienced instructors, Alpha Kilo Aviation offers a range of training programs, including Sport Pilot, Private Pilot, Instrument, and Commercial certifications. The school also provides services such as Biennial Flight Reviews, Ground School, and Instrument Proficiency Checks. Committed to quality instruction and a supportive learning environment, Alpha Kilo Aviation is dedicated to helping aspiring pilots achieve their aviation dreams. Schedule your flight today and take the first step towards becoming a skilled aviator.
services:
